name: Temper Flare
description: Spurred by desperation, you attack the target. Make a melee attack, dealing 2d4 + MOVE fire damage on a hit. If you missed an attack roll last turn, then add an additional damage die to your damage roll.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
